name: Boukoku no Aegis 2035: Warship Gunner
summary: Boukoku no Aegis 2035: Warship Gunner is a movie tie-in video game for the Japanese live-action summer film, Boukoku no Aegis. Harutoshi Fukui, the author of the base novel, personally planned the screenplay for Boukoku no Aegis 2035. The game presents an original sequel to this continuity which has not been referenced in his other works.
